channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 奥斯汀的一位对冲基金投资人在决定完全在家工作后，想要大手笔地建造一座价值 18 万美元的图书馆，用来存放他的大量藏书。
item.description:
After deciding to work exclusively from home, an Austin-based hedge funder wanted to go big on a $180,000 library that would house his enormous book collection https://t.co/60PhFhNyAL https://t.co/60PhFhNyAL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 巴哈马这个悠闲的小岛已成为富人和名人的热点。但这里也有许多值得体验的地方--从纯净的海滩到美味的路边餐馆，都适合我们这些普通人。
item.description:
This tiny, laid-back island in the Bahamas has become a hotspot for the rich and famous. But there's much to experience—from pristine beaches to delicious roadside restaurants—for the rest of us, too. https://t.co/0JWU7cTSQ9 https://t.co/0JWU7cTSQ9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: Streetwise 专栏作家 @jmackin2 写道：私营部门投资者在监督公司方面效率低下，以至于国营基金认为有必要介入其中
item.description:
Private-sector investors are so ineffective at overseeing companies that state-run funds feel the need to step in, Streetwise columnist @jmackin2 writes https://t.co/l8wREyVpPj https://t.co/l8wREyVpPj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看：SPICE 制导工具包将无制导炸弹转化为智能精确制导弹药。以下是它们的工作原理及其限制加沙平民伤亡的潜力。
item.description:
Watch: SPICE guidance kits transform unguided bombs into smart, precision guided munitions. Here’s how they work and their potential to limit civilian casualties in Gaza. https://t.co/XIzN3zI0lv https://t.co/XIzN3zI0lv

item.title: 越来越多的购物者转向二手网站，出售几乎没用过的名牌服装和手袋。大品牌对此并不满意。
item.description:

item.title: 朝鲜领导人金正恩扩大了核武库，并与俄罗斯建立了联系，不再以与韩国统一为目标。美国及其盟国对此感到震惊。
item.description:
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un enlarged his nuclear arsenal and built ties to Russia, no longer aiming for reunification with South Korea. The U.S. and its allies are alarmed. https://t.co/YiezVRs2an https://t.co/YiezVRs2an

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 随着以色列赶走哈马斯，无法无天的状况阻碍了加沙的援助工作，那里的平民普遍面临饥饿问题

item.title: 据称从中国一家网络安全公司泄露的大量文件揭示了中国政府如何利用监控在境内外实施政治控制。
item.description:

item.title: 越来越多的男性被诊断出患有前列腺癌时已为时已晚，无法治愈。"我现在的情况是完全可以避免的"。

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：加州的丛林初选名副其实，但并没有兑现其促进温和的承诺。民主党众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）和凯蒂-波特（Katie Porter）为争夺该州空缺的美国参议院席位而大打出手。艾丽西亚-芬利（Allysia Finley）写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: California’s jungle primary is living up to its name but not its promise of promoting moderation. Witness the catfight between Democratic Reps. Adam Schiff and Katie Porter for the state’s open U.S. Senate seat, writes Allysia Finley. https://t.co/ANr4kPZe3D

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 名人、运动员和科学家都说，"葡萄糖女神法 "能帮助他们思维更清晰、精力更充沛、欲望更低。但其中的一些指导意见却饱受争议。
item.description:
Celebrities, athletes and scientists say the Glucose Goddess Method helps them think more clearly, have more energy and reduce cravings. But some of its guidance is controversial. https://t.co/GA8lNwu9jehttps://t.co/GA8lNwu9je

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 航空公司正在推出一系列飞往弗吉尼亚州诺福克和墨西哥图卢姆等地的新航线。这可能会让您享受到更便宜的机票。
item.description:

item.title: 像 Bookstagram 这样的在线书友会正在促成面对面的友谊。"我绝对没有想到它会发展成现在这样的友谊"。
item.description:
Online book clubs like Bookstagram are leading to in-person friendships. “I definitely didn’t see it turning into the friendships that it has.” https://t.co/yEuYAA9sda pic.twitter.com/DuacsU7TzX

item.title: 拜登总统说，加沙的战斗最早可能在本周末停止。"我希望下周一就能实现停火"

item.title: 当之无愧的好莱坞最佳着装奖得主不是瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling），也不是杰里米-艾伦-怀特（Jeremy Allen White）。而是马蒂-马西森（Matty Matheson），这位从纹身到指甲的厨师变成了明星。
item.description:
It’s not Ryan Gosling or Jeremy Allen White who deserves the title of best dressed in Hollywood right now. It’s Matty Matheson, the tattooed-to-the-fingernails chef turned star. https://t.co/tnWunkgwUu https://t.co/tnWunkgwUu

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷新总统哈维尔-米莱伊非常喜欢他的五只克隆英国獒犬。在米莱伊试图解决世界上最高的通货膨胀率时，这种奇特的关系为反对者提供了素材。
item.description:
Argentina’s new president, Javier Milei, adores his five cloned English mastiffs. The peculiar relationship is providing fodder for opponents as Milei tries to tackle the world’s highest inflation. https://t.co/6veevCu4Vr https://t.co/6veevCu4Vr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 2020 年，Netflix 推出了一档约会真人秀节目，该节目的前提非常诱人：两个人能否在从未见过对方的情况下坠入爱河？以下是迅速成为超新星的《爱情盲点》是如何帮助这家流媒体公司建立起一个帝国的。
item.description:
In 2020, Netflix released a reality-dating show with a tantalizing premise: Could two people fall in love without ever seeing each other? Here's how “Love Is Blind,” which quickly went supernova, helped the streamer build an empire. https://t.co/kxXvpM4WPF https://t.co/kxXvpM4WPF

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 10 月 7 日，蕾切尔-戈德堡-波林（Rachel Goldberg-Polin）摇身一变，成为拯救她儿子和其他剩余人质生命的国际努力的倡导者、战略家和代言人。

item.title: 人工智能驱动的红利让英伟达的估值达到了 2 万亿美元。这使它成为竞争对手甚至客户的巨大目标，他们都想削弱它的主导地位
item.description:
An AI-driven bonanza has sent Nvidia’s valuation to the $2 trillion stratosphere. That's made it a giant target for rivals and even customers that want to diminish its dominance https://t.co/AyZxx1AFzz https://t.co/AyZxx1AFzz
